history.summary: Easy-to-use social media and campaign management platform, designed specifically for charities and social enterprises

First approach to Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (Python)

history.summary: A full-service digital content agency designed for next generation marketing mostly focused on videos.

Build a proof of concept mobile app for M&S (Cordova, Ionic, Angular 1)

history.summary: With offices in 17 countries and over 1000 staff, IG Index is a global leader in online trading.

Optimise loading time (lazy loading for every components)
Unit testing (Karma/Jasmine)
Saas application using ExtJS, PHP and MySQL
Generate PDF reports (up to 1.2M lines) by extracting relevant information from the database (SQL queries)
Tracking down memory leaks (users almost never close the app)

testimonials.quote: It’s my absolute pleasure to recommend Florian Herrengt as a Fullstack developer.  I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with him, and came to know him as a truly valuable asset to absolutely any team.

testimonials.quote: Without a doubt, I confidently recommend Florian to join your team. As a dedicated and knowledgeable employee and an all-around great person, I know that he will be a beneficial addition to your organisation.
